question: 野蛮
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Barbarian</kanji>s who live in <kanji>field</kanji>s, not even in huts or houses or anything, are called <vocabulary>savage</vocabulary> by people who DO live in huts and houses. They think if you live out in a field you're really <vocabulary>uncivilized</vocabulary>. But that's all a matter of opinion, I guess.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
